snippet: STORER - Francis E.,Jr. died March 24, 2016 in Naples, FL. Son of Francis E. Storer, Sr. and Eleanor Hastings. Educated at Browning, St. Paul's, Yale, Columbia College and Law School. Corporal in the US Army Air Corps in England during WWII. Writer and editor for Argosy, Tennis USA. Husband of Nancy Bruce Fulton Storer (deceased). Father of Adine M.B. Storer, grandfather of Ian H. Magnusson. Donations to Avow Hospice 1095 Whippoorwill Lane, Naples, FL 34105. 1/3
lead_paragraph: STORER - Francis E.,Jr. died March 24, 2016 in Naples, FL. Son of Francis E. Storer, Sr. and Eleanor Hastings. Educated at Browning, St. Paul's, Yale, Columbia College and Law School. Corporal in the US Army Air Corps in England during WWII. Writer and editor for Argosy, Tennis USA. Husband of Nancy Bruce Fulton Storer (deceased). Father of Adine M.B. Storer, grandfather of Ian H. Magnusson. Donations to Avow Hospice 1095 Whippoorwill Lane, Naples, FL 34105. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  STORER, FRANCIS E.
